title: Warriors strike back
description:
Jalen & Jacoby talk the Warriors Game 2 win over the Celtics in the NBA Finals. Most people labor under the misconception that there are only 30 teams in the NBA…but Jalen reveals why it was actually the 31st team in the league that beat Boston last night: the “3rd Quarter Warriors” were in the house. PLUS – Draymond Green set the tone in Game 2 with his energy and intensity on the defensive side of the ball, and of course, with his ability to get under his opponent’s skin. The guys discuss what the means for the Celtics moving forward in the series. AND – it wasn’t all good for Golden State. Klay Thompson still hasn’t gotten off, which has some sounding alarm bells for the Warriors…but Jalen will tell you why he’s not worried about Klay YET.  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
